title: Engineering a molecular electrocatalytic system for energy-efficient ammonia production from wastewater nitrate
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,5691-5705
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01727G, Paper
Dean M. Miller, Matthew J. Liu, Kristen Abels, Anna Kogler, Kindle S. Williams, William A. Tarpeh
Electrocatalyst-in-a-box, a novel reactive separation process, enables a molecular catalyst to convert wastewater nitrate into purified ammonia.
